headline: Is American Electric Power Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: While American Electric Power has lagged behind the broader Nasdaq Composite over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Is American Electric Power Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?

headline: FERC transmission rate decision sparks dissent over possible bill increases
summary: In the decision involving American Electric Power, Evergy and Berkshire Hathaway Energy, FERC Commissioner Lindsay See said she was open to transmission incentive reforms.
